review: I am happy to say that this FireStick worked right out of the box, no problems setting it up, no real difficulty in connecting to the wifi. We can watch Amazon Prime movies and TV shows for free, and their library is pretty good. The HD video is very good quality.Very occasionally (twice in one month) the movie freezes while the streaming data recovers, and then the movie restarts with no problem and no action needed by the viewer. Once, the dreaded message "No Wi-Fi available" came up. I just rebooted the wifi router, and the problem disappeared. It's a great product!
